enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a JSON string and a key as input, making them suitable for similar test setup scenarios.
The buildJSONString method constructs a JSON string, which can be used to generate test data for getJSONStringValue.
Both methods return a value extracted from a JSON object, making their outputs comparable in test assertions.
The addKeyValue method modifies a JSON object, which can be used to create expected JSON structures for assertions in getJSONStringValue tests.
